meanings.sent1: She was wholly focused on her book, not noticing anything around her.
meanings.sent2: The cake was eaten wholly by the hungry children in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear wholly, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: His love for music was so strong that it consumed him wholly.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone wholly in the dark night sky, creating a mesmerizing view.

meanings.sent1: The puzzle was solved wholly by the clever detective in record time.

meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room wholly, bringing joy to everyone present.
meanings.sent5: The storm raged wholly outside, making it impossible to go out.
